segments.text: I observe the scene in the kitchen with wide eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whoa, the sink is completely overflowing with water gushing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't even notice; she's too busy with her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring down the front of the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are raiding the cookie jar without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretched out on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could collapse under him any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, ready to catch a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside the window is beautiful and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm amazed at how the woman hasn't heard the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is huge now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to be a big cleanup job.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies look delicious, though; wish I had one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything feels so tense inside while outside it's peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR
